title: "Artificial intelligence learns to detect another lung condition"
excerpt: "Neural networks developed in Moscow learned how to detect another lung pathology, hydrothorax, using computer tomography. Fluid accumulation inside the chest may point at various conditions and provoke life-threatening acute respiratory failure."
